CLASS.VALUE:
/**
 * The interface ${name}.

 </#if> <#list element.typeParameters as typeParameter> * @param <${typeParameter.name}> the type parameter
 </#list> */

METHOD.VALUE:
/**
 * The entry point of application.

<#if element.parameterList.parameters?has_content> *
 </#if> * @param ${element.parameterList.parameters[0].name} the input arguments
 <#if element.throwsList.referenceElements?has_content> *

 </#list> */
